name: Smash Inc.
description:
Everything your car intersects is crashing, smashing and will be destroyed. The more things you will smash the more cars and locations you will open.

Features:
- 5 cars;
- 3 locations: big city, canyon and countryside;
- smash glass, destroy trees and rocks, walls and fences, road signs and even bus stops;
- last level is a canyon route with beautiful waterfalls.
